articles.title: $8M South End penthouse in converted church has views of Prudential Center
articles.description:
Located in the former Concord Baptist Church, the penthouse unit is for sale for $8 million.

The post $8M South End penthouse in converted church has views of Prudential Center appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Converted Concord Baptist Church offers an $8 million penthouse with city views.
Penthouse features panoramic views of the Prudential Center, enhancing local luxury real estate.
Sale could influence property values and market trends in the South End neighborhood.
